entry.title: Dicroismo [Timdami]
entry.summary:
Author: Succiduous_be

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,123Chapters: 8/22Kudos: 17

Summary: There's a path between indulgence and vulnerability. At some point in this, a year-long process of gravitating, being each other's binary star, Timothy realized he had taken advantage, he had eaten more than he could bite. Now he can't face the consequences. Although it was too late, there was only one answer.
